Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Chief Justice Roberts, President Carter, President Clinton, President Bush, President Obama, fellow Americans and people of the world, thank you.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We, the citizens of America, are now joined in a great national effort to rebuild our country and restore its promise for all of our people.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Together, we will determine the course of America and the world for many, many years to come.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will face challenges, we will confront hardships, but we will get the job done.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Every four years, we gather on these steps to carry out the orderly and peaceful transfer of power, and we are grateful to President Obama and First Lady Michelle Obama for their gracious aid throughout this transition.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: They have been magnificent.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Thank you.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Today's ceremony, however, has very special meaning because today, we are not merely transferring power from one administration to another or from one party to another, but we are transferring power from Washington, D.C. and giving it back to you, the people.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: For too long, a small group in our nation's capital has reaped the rewards of government while the people have borne the cost.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Washington flourished, but the people did not share in its wealth.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Politicians prospered, but the jobs left and the factories closed.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The establishment protected itself, but not the citizens of our country.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Their victories have not been your victories.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Their triumphs have not been your triumphs.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And while they celebrated in our nation's capital, there was little to celebrate for struggling families all across our land.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: That all changes starting right here and right now because this moment is your moment, it belongs to you.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: It belongs to everyone gathered here today and everyone watching all across America.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: This is your day.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: This is your celebration.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And this, the United States of America, is your country.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: What truly matters is not which party controls our government, but whether our government is controlled by the people.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: January 20th, 2017 will be remembered as the day the people became the rulers of this nation again.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The forgotten men and women of our country will be forgotten no longer.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Everyone is listening to you now.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: You came by the tens of millions to become part of a historic movement, the likes of which the world has never seen before.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: At the center of this movement is a crucial conviction, that a nation exists to serve its citizens.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Americans want great schools for their children, safe neighborhoods for their families, and good jobs for themselves.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: These are just and reasonable demands of righteous people and a righteous public.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: But for too many of our citizens, a different reality exists.
Mothers and children trapped in poverty in our inner cities.
Rusted out factories scattered like tombstones across the landscape of our nation.
An education system flush with cash, but which leaves our young and beautiful students deprived of all knowledge.
And the crime and the gangs and the drugs that have stolen too many lives and robbed our country of so much unrealized potential.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: This American carnage stops right here and stops right now.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: (APPLAUSE) We are one nation and their pain is our pain.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Their dreams are our dreams.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And their success will be our success.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We share one heart, one home, and one glorious destiny.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The oath of office I take today is an oath of allegiance to all Americans.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: For many decades, we've enriched foreign industry at the expense of American industry; subsidized the armies of other countries, while allowing for the very sad depletion of our military.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We've defended other nations' borders while refusing to defend our own.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And spent trillions and trillions of dollars overseas while America's infrastructure has fallen into disrepair and decay.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We've made other countries rich, while the wealth, strength and confidence of our country has dissipated over the horizon.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: One by one, the factories shuttered and left our shores, with not even a thought about the millions and millions of American workers that were left behind.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The wealth of our middle class has been ripped from their homes and then redistributed all across the world.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: But that is the past.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And now, we are looking only to the future.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We assembled here today are issuing a new decree to be heard in every city, in every foreign capital, and in every hall of power.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: From this day forward, a new vision will govern our land.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: From this day forward, it's going to be only America first, America first.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Every decision on trade, on taxes, on immigration, on foreign affairs will be made to benefit American workers and American families.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We must protect our borders from the ravages of other countries making our products, stealing our companies and destroying our jobs.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Protection will lead to great prosperity and strength.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: I will fight for you with every breath in my body and I will never ever let you down.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: America will start winning again, winning like never before.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will bring back our jobs.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will bring back our borders.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will bring back our wealth.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And we will bring back our dreams.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will build new roads and highways and bridges and airports and tunnels and railways all across our wonderful nation.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will get our people off of welfare and back to work, rebuilding our country with American hands and American labor.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will follow two simple rules; buy American and hire American.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will seek friendship and goodwill with the nations of the world, but we do so with the understanding that it is the right of all nations to put their own interests first.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We do not seek to impose our way of life on anyone, but rather to let it shine as an example.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will shine for everyone to follow.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will reinforce old alliances and form new ones and unite the civilized world against radical Islamic terrorism, which we will eradicate from the face of the Earth.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: At the bedrock of our politics will be a total allegiance to the United States of America, and through our loyalty to our country, we will rediscover our loyalty to each other.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: When you open your heart to patriotism, there is no room for prejudice.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The Bible tells us how good and pleasant it is when God's people live together in unity.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We must speak our minds openly, debate our disagreements honestly, but always pursue solidarity.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: When America is united, America is totally unstoppable.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: There should be no fear.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We are protected and we will always be protected.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will be protected by the great men and women of our military and law enforcement.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And most importantly, we will be protected by God.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Finally, we must think big and dream even bigger.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: In America, we understand that a nation is only living as long as it is striving.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will no longer accept politicians who are all talk and no action, constantly complaining, but never doing anything about it.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: The time for empty talk is over.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Now arrives the hour of action.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Do not allow anyone to tell you that it cannot be done.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: No challenge can match the heart and fight and spirit of America.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will not fail.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Our country will thrive and prosper again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We stand at the birth of a new millennium, ready to unlock the mysteries of space, to free the earth from the miseries of disease, and to harness the energies, industries and technologies of tomorrow.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: A new national pride will stir ourselves, lift our sights and heal our divisions.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: It's time to remember that old wisdom our soldiers will never forget, that whether we are black or brown or white, we all bleed the same red blood of patriots.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We all enjoy the same glorious freedoms and we all salute the same great American flag.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And whether a child is born in the urban sprawl of Detroit or the wind-swept plains of Nebraska, they look up at the same night sky, they fill their heart with the same dreams, and they are infused with the breath of life by the same almighty creator.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: So to all Americans in every city near and far, small and large, from mountain to mountain, from ocean to ocean, hear these words: You will never be ignored again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: (APPLAUSE) Your voice, your hopes, and your dreams will define our American destiny.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And your courage and goodness and love will forever guide us along the way.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Together, we will make America strong again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will make America wealthy again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will make America proud again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: We will make America safe again.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And yes, together we will make America great again.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Thank you.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: God bless you.

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: And God bless America.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: Thank you.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)

Speaker: TRUMP
Text: God bless America.

Speaker: SYSTEM
Text: (APPLAUSE)
